events.message: I recently received my order but I want to return it because the product does not meet my expectations. How can I get a refund?
System has classified the issue as a Refund based on the customer's request for a return and money back.
Your case has been assigned to a customer service agent who will assist you with the refund process.
Hello! Thank you for contacting us about your return. I’m here to help you with the refund procedure.
Could you please provide your order number and the reason why you want to return the product? This will help us process your refund quickly.
My order number is 4583921. The item doesn’t work as described and I’m very disappointed with the quality, so I want to return it for a full refund.
Thank you for the information. We will initiate your refund immediately once you ship the product back using the prepaid return label we will email you shortly.
Thanks for the quick response and the prepaid label. I appreciate your help resolving this so easily.
We have received your returned package and processed the refund to your original payment method. Please allow 3-5 business days for the amount to show.
Just following up to confirm you have received your refund and if you need any further assistance from us.
Since your refund was successful and no further questions were received, we are closing this case. Thank you for your patience.
